General.Name: Labrador Technologies Inc
General.Description: Labrador Resources Inc. operates as an oil and gas exploration company. It focuses on an oil and gas property located in Alberta. The company was formerly known as Labrador Technologies Inc. and changed its name to Labrador Resources Inc. in February 2023. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 3400-350 7th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 3N9
